mapper.select: INSERT INTO nutrition.daily_nutrient_amount ( daily_nutrient_amount_id, account_id, year_month_day, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{dailyNutrientAmountId.dailyNutrientAmountId}, #{accountId.accountId}, #{date}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO nutrition.evaluation ( daily_nutrient_amount_id, score, energy_high_and_low, not_subject_to_evaluation, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{dailyNutrientAmountId.dailyNutrientAmountId}, 0, 0, false, now(), now() )
SELECT daily_nutrient_amount_id FROM nutrition.daily_nutrient_amount WHERE year_month_day = #{date} AND account_id = #{accountId.accountId}

SELECT nutrition_type, sum(nutrition_amount) as nutrient_amount FROM nutrition.manual_entry_of_nutrients as manual_nutrients JOIN nutrition.meal as meal ON manual_nutrients.meal_id = meal.meal_id WHERE nutrition_type = 'ENERGY' AND daily_nutrient_amount_id = #{dailyNutrientAmountId.dailyNutrientAmountId} GROUP BY nutrition_type
